All functions

Add confounders to a DAG

broken_hockeystick()

Apply shifted-hockeystick function

Convert a causal order into a CPDAG

Convert a causal order into a fully connected DAG

Perform causal discovery

Causal evaluation metrics

pick_elements()

Randomly pick elements Select each element of vec with probability prob and produce a vector with the selected elements.

psi_matrix()
